name: PLAN_GRP
description: The PLAN_GRP table contains information about your employer groups. An employer group is a unit of a corporation or company made up of employees who share the same benefit plan.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the employer group.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record
